description.en: Due to the school bully's threat to get him game items, Ha Do-wan, the unlucky game shuttle, died after playing games all night long for a week. The moment he died, he got respawned to the classroom one week before he died... Everything is the same as that day. The only thing that has changed is the floating in front of him! What? Use the skills of the games I've played so far to beat the bully?!?!
description.fr: À cause de la menace des harceleurs de son école qui l'obligent à gagner des objets dans un jeu, Ha Do-Wan, le malheureux joueur à tout faire, est mort après avoir joué sans arrêt pendant une semaine. Au moment où il est mort, il s'est fait réincarner dans sa salle de classe une semaine avant sa mort... Tout est comme ce jour-là. La seule chose qui a changé est cette fenêtre volante devant lui ! Quoi ? Utiliser les skills que j'ai utilisé dans tous les jeux auxquels j'ai pu jouer jusqu'ici pour battre les harceleurs ?!?!
description.ru: После угроз и запугиваний школьного хулигана, который требовал добыть предметы, Ха До Ван всю неделю проводит ночи напролет за играми, умирает и перерождается в школьном кабинете за неделю до этого... Все было точно таким же, как в тот день. Изменилось только одно - это "Оповещение о квесте", которое всплыло перед глазами! Что? От меня требуется победить этого хулигана, используя все мои игровые навыки?
description.pt-br: Após ser forçado pelo valentão da escola a dropar um item lendário, Ha Dowan, o escravo gamer, morre depois de passar a sete dias seguidos jogando. No momento de sua morte, ele renasce na sala de aula, uma semana antes do dia em que morreu. Tudo está exatamente igual àquele dia. A única coisa diferente é que a <notificação de missão> está flutuando na frente dele! “O quê? tenho que usar as habilidades de todos os jogos que joguei até hoje pra descer o cacete nesse desgraçado?!”

description.en: Gripping the wheel of a monster truck with a displacement of 30,000cc and 1,000 horsepower, Hanamaru Bakuzo drives down the road of justice! Together with new delivery driver Kuriyama, he takes on deliveries more dangerous than the next.

(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

description.vi:
Thời học sinh bạn đã bao giờ crush ai chưa?
Cậu bạn cùng bàn?
Lớp trưởng học giỏi?
Hay một anh khóa trên điến trai?

Chắc hắn rất nhiều người trong chúng ta đều từng có một thời thầm thương trộm nhớ ai đó. Giống như cô bạn nhỏ nhắn Bách Linh và cậu hot boy An Dư Triết thầm thích nhau mà không hay vậy.

"Yêu thâm" là câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn với những ngại ngùng, quan tâm vô tình và ghen tuông nho nhỏ, khiến màu sắc cuộc sống của đôi bạn trẻ trở nên tươi đẹp và muôn màu hơn. Đồng thời bộ truyện cũng giúp người đọc trải nghiệm những cung bậc cảm xúc ngọt ngào, lãng mạn, đôi khi trầm lắng nhưng lại ngây ngô ngốc nghếch của cả hai.

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

description.en:
A great war has raged for years between the scientifically advanced Empire and Nebulis, the realm of the witches―until the youngest knight ever to receive the title of the Empire's strongest meets the princess of the rival nation. Though they are sworn enemies, the knight is taken by her beauty and dignity, and the princess is moved by his strength and way of life. Will the fighting between them ever be allowed to end?  
  


---
description.ru: Империя, обладающая продвинутым уровнем знаний, и Управление Императорского двора Небулис, которое Империя опасалась как «страну ведьм». На затяжной войне между этими странами встретились парень и девушка. Мечник, что с раннего возраста и на протяжении всей истории Империи стал абсолютной силой на поле брани — Иска. И принцесса, известная как «Ледяная ведьма», ценящаяся как сильнейший человек во всём Управлении Императорского двора — Алисализ. «Если поймаешь меня, твои мечты могут осуществиться». «Аналогично, если одолеешь меня, то сделаешь шаг вперёд в объединении мира». Итак, два заклятых врага попытались убить друг друга. Однако сердце парня было украдено благородной красавицей. А девушку влекло к сильному пареньку и его образу жизни. Но даже так они не могут ходить бок о бок друг с другом, поэтому перед ними оставался единственный путь — победить друг друга.
description.pt-br: O Império, uma nação de máqunias e ciência avançada. A Agência do Clã Real Nebulis, uma terra temida como o "país dos desejos". Em meio a essa interminável guerra entre os dois, um garoto e uma menina se encontram. A bruxa do gelo reverenciada como a mais forte: A Princesa Aliceliese O jovem espadachim que está entre as mais poderosas forças do Império: Iska Os dois são inimigos nesta guerra. No entanto, assim como o garoto se encanta pela beleza e nobreza da garota, ela se sente atraída por sua força e seu jeito de viver. A cooperação é impossível e não existe caminho a seguir exceto passando por cima um do outro. Ainda assim...

description.en: Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... A love-filled scum boy meets a deeply affectionate company girl, and a love like a powerful drug begins!?
description.ja: 日々の生活と仕事に疲れ切っている社会人2年目の吉野（よしの）。人生最悪のある日泥酔した吉野が翌朝目覚めると、となりに寝ていたのは謎めいた男子「花くん」だった。 期間限定で一緒に暮らすことになり、意外にも花くんとの生活に居心地の良さを覚えていく吉野。そんな中、ある事件をきっかけに花くんになぜか執着されることになって… 愛の重いクズ男子×情の深い社畜女子、劇薬みたいな恋がはじまる⁉

title.en: How to Prey on Your Master

altTitles.en: How to Bite the Master
How to Eat the Master

altTitles.ja: ご主人様を虜にする方法

description.en:
Dame Elle, the deputy commander of the Order of November, has her heart broken when she discovers her fiancé is in love with someone else. After a night of heavy drinking to wash away the pain, she wakes up the next morning in the bed of Sir Theodore, more widely known as the kingdom’s mad dog! Adding more to the confusion, Theodore keeps calling Elle his “master” and has been appointed as the deputy commander’s aide without her knowledge. But despite his wolfish reputation, Theodore acts oddly tame when it comes to the dame he serves. Just what intentions could this knight be hiding behind his sharp-toothed grin?

---
Elle Louise Therese was the most outstanding knight of the Raun Empire. At a party, she witnessed the affair of her fiancé and called off their engagement. El, who's in deep sorrow due to the shock, lost consciousness and collapsed. And the next morning, Elle faced an unexpected person. It's Theodore, who's famous for his crazy dog nickname! But somehow, Theodore was too polite in front of her?!

---

라운 왕국의 뛰어난 기사, 엘 루이즈 테레즈. 
그녀는 어느 파티에서 약혼자의 바람을 목격하고 파혼을 선언한다. 
파혼에 대한 충격으로 깊은 슬픔에 잠긴 나머지 정신을 잃고 쓰러진 엘. 
그리고 다음 날 아침, 엘은 뜻밖의 인물을 마주한다. 
바로 미친개로 유명한 개또라이 왕족 테오도르를! 
그런데 그 테오도르가 왠지 내 앞에서는 과하게 예의가 바르다?!

---

description.tr:
Kasım Düzeni'nin komutan yardımcısı Dame Elle, nişanlısının başka birine aşık olduğunu öğrenince kalbi kırılır. Acısını unutmak için içki içtiği bir gecenin ardından, ertesi sabah daha çok krallığın kuduz köpeği olarak bilinen Sör Theodore'un yatağında uyanır! Theodore, Elle'e sürekli "efendim" diye hitap etmektedir ve Elle'in haberi olmadan komutan yardımcısı olarak atanmıştır. Ancak kuduz köpek ününe rağmen Theodore, hizmet ettiği kadına karşı garip bir şekilde uysal davranmaktadır. Bu şövalye keskin dişli sırıtışının ardında ne gibi niyetler saklıyor olabilir?

description.en:
"Excuse me, are you Korean?"

Due to a recent heartbreak, Hanjoon arrives at New York.

Not only is he delighted to meet a Korean in an unfamiliar city,
he has a one-night stand with him.

"I should've asked for his name."

However, these two end up meeting again in an unusual place.

Where will their one-night stand in the artist's city of New York lead them to?
description.pl:
"Przepraszam, jesteś Koreańczykiem?"

Z powodu niedawnego złamanego serca Hanjoon przybywa do Nowego Jorku.

Nie tylko jest zachwycony spotkaniem Koreańczyka w nieznanym mieście,
ma z nim jednonocną przygodę.

"Powinienem był zapytać o jego imię".

Jednak ta dwójka spotyka się ponownie w nietypowym miejscu.

Dokąd zaprowadzi ich jednonocna przygoda w mieście artysty, Nowym Jorku?

description.en: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.

altTitles.en: Girls and Science

description.en: They were childhood friends, and she had always been more powerful than him. But when they accidentally traveled (summoned?) to another world, it was finally time for him to become the knight in shining armor! He had to find her first though, since they were separated… Come and witness his fight to be better in a crazy world where monsters roamed and technology was so advanced your amputated limbs could be restored to perfection…

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I’ve Been Handling the Company’s In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en:
Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons. 

To everyone working in a stressful company, this is a story that helps you smile a little for tomorrow's sake.

Lee Yoonsung and Park Dokyung grew up together in the countryside since they were young. Yoonsung became an actor by chance, but whenever he has time, he travels back and forth between Seoul and his hometown to see Dokyung, his first and unrequited love.

Dokyung cared for Yoonsung, who had cried a lot since he was young.
Yoonsung finds himself developing stronger feelings for Dokyung, and his body's responses are becoming more noticeable.
Fearing that his feelings would be exposed, Yoonsung tries not to show and resolves to remain at least a friend... -Madeleine Scans-

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/i-shall-master-this-family/info)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

---

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

---

description.en: "It’s my first time with a man." "So, don’t blame me if this relationship doesn’t work out." Yeo Hanju, who confessed his love to Choi Chanyoung-sunbae, ended up becoming an unexplainable partner to Chanyoung. Although every day is filled with regret and humiliation, he can't stop his relationship with him. But then one day, Hanju unexpectedly got a stepmother and stepbrother. His stepbrother's name is Yoo Jihyeon. After that Hanju… 'I still regret that moment.'

title.en: My Home As a Filming Location!

description.en:
After returning from walking around my neighborhood, I was met with an entire film crew in my front yard?!
Yeonwoo, a beekeeper who lived in a secluded village, signed a contract that stated that his house would be used for filming with a PD who directed <Countryside Occupations> while he was drunk.
Later on, he found out that he would be filming his life with Kang Dojoon, a famous Korean actor.
Begrudgingly, he started to prepare for filming.
Contrary to what he thought before, he changed his mind after seeing Kang Dojoon in person.

*If I have to live with a handsome guy like that for 10 days... that wouldn't be so bad.*

Will Dojoon successfully complete filming for <Countryside Occupations>?

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!

The assassin with a scary mug has arrived in the town where the (air-headed) policewoman with a strong sense of justice lives! 
Although his target is a businessman, his constant flirting with the policewoman is causing him great trouble! 
The assassin constantly tries to stop the businessman who is in love with the policewoman… 
and if you look closely, there's a possible love triangle?!

Keep an eye on this fantastic love comedy.

altTitles.en: Hey, Little Duke Have Faith in Your Sister!

description.en:
Trusting only her talent in swordsmanship, Espin tried to become the best knight but failed. It was because of Duke Xenoc Blacknight, the no. 1 knight in the Empire. She hated him so much; he was nothing but an enemy.

"I won."

She was finally able to beat him, but her last memory was leaving the chivalric order then jumping in front of a carriage to save a rabbit. She thought she was going to die just like that… but she got resurrected? She opened her eyes back in the Empire 18 years earlier, in a completely different body!

"So if I gather sacred beasts like you, you’ll bring me back to my original time?"

-Exactly!

So if she helps the sacred beasts, she can go back to her original time and live a new life! Instead of being resurrected, she wanted to live and enjoy the things she wasn't able to before.

"No, I-I'm scared…!"

The Xenoc from 18 years ago is crying while hugging her?!

"You… said you would marry me. Why are you running away?"

Will Espin, who suddenly became a time-traveler, be able to fulfil her mission and go back?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B4%90%EC%9A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98-%EB%88%84%EB%82%98%EB%A7%8C-%EB%AF%BF%EC%96%B4/2878), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59457640)
description.pt:
Confiando apenas em seu talento com a espada, Espin tentou se tornar a melhor cavaleira, mas falhou. Foi por causa do Duque Senok Blacknight. O cavaleiro n° 1 do Império. Ela o odiava tanto. Ele não passava de um inimigo.

“Eu venci.”

Finalmente consegui vencê-lo, mas minha última lembrança foi sair da ordem dos cavaleiros e pular na frente de uma carruagem para salvar um coelho. Pensei que ia morrer assim… mas eu ressuscitei? Abri meus olhos no Império 18 anos atrás, em um corpo completamente diferente!

—

“Então, se eu reunir bestas sagradas como você, você vai me trazer de volta ao meu tempo original?”

“Exatamente!”

Então, se eu ajudar as bestas sagradas, posso voltar ao meu tempo original e viver uma nova vida! Em vez de ressuscitar, eu queria viver e aproveitar as coisas que antes não podia desfrutar.

“Não, e-eu estou com medo…!”

O Senok de 18 anos atrás está chorando enquanto me abraça?!

“Você… disse que se casaria comigo. Por que você está fugindo?”

Será que Espin, que de repente se tornou uma viajante do tempo, conseguirá cumprir sua missão e voltar?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B4%90%EC%9A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98-%EB%88%84%EB%82%98%EB%A7%8C-%EB%AF%BF%EC%96%B4/2878), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59457640)
description.vi:
Espin chỉ tin vào tài năng kiếm thuật thiên tài, cô muốn trở thành kỵ sĩ đỉnh nhất nhưng đã thất bại. Tất cả là do công tước Cenok Blacknight, kỵ sĩ số 1 ở đế quốc. Espin vô cùng ghét anh ta. Đối với cô, anh ta không khác gì kẻ thù. “Mình đã thắng anh ta.” Cuối cùng cũng thắng được, nhưng đó là ký ức cuối cùng của cô trước khi rời khỏi đoàn kỵ sĩ và cứu một con thỏ suýt bị xe ngựa đâm.

Cứ tưởng thế này là toi đời thật rồi…nhưng cô lại sống lại ư?
Lại còn mở mắt trong một cơ thể hoàn toàn khác tại đế quốc vào 18 năm trước nữa!
Người đã cứu sống cô ấy chính là thần tú của thế giới khác!
‘Vậy tức là, nếu tập hợp được thần tú khác như ngươi thì ngươi sẽ đưa ta về đúng mốc thời gian cũ sao?”

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B4%90%EC%9A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EB%8B%98-%EB%88%84%EB%82%98%EB%A7%8C-%EB%AF%BF%EC%96%B4/2878), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59457640)
description.zh-hk:
我的名字叫埃斯賓，是擁有過人劍術才能的天才，努力想要成為最強騎士卻以失敗告終，只因打不過位於帝國第一的騎士塞諾公爵，超級討厭他，我和他簡直是冤家。

終於有一回我贏了，沒想到為了營救馬車車輪下的兔子卻成為我最後的記憶，以為自己死翹翹怎麼又活了？

還不是我現在的身體，睜眼卻是18年前的帝國！救我的還是另一個世界的神獸！

“也就是說，我收集和你一樣的神獸你就能幫助我回到以前嗎？”“是的，只要幫助神獸你就能回到以前重新生活！”

既然又重新活過來我要享受以前沒享受過的東西，好好活著。 “嗚嗚，我、我好怕...！”塞諾18年前是個愛哭鬼，還往我懷裡鑽？

“你...你說過要和我結婚，為什麼要逃跑？”變成時間旅行者的埃斯賓能否順利完成任務回到以前呢？ ？

---

description.pt-br: O domador de feras Rein, que usa animais, era um membro do grupo do herói. No entanto, como não podia fazer mais nada, não conseguiu acompanhar o ritmo da batalha. “Você só sabe brincar com os animais. Está despedido’. Rein é expulso do grupo e agora vive livremente como um aventureiro. Em sua jornada, ele conhece uma garota de uma tribo de gatos, a chamada espécie mais forte. Por outro lado, o grupo do herói permanece inconsciente de que seu sucesso anterior foi tudo graças a Rein… Esta é a história de um domador de feras que não se segura mais e seu fatídico encontro com uma companheira preciosa.

Our protagonist, the speedrunning emperor of "Another Verse", suddenly feels sleepy in the middle of practice.
When he awakens, the familiar opening of "Another Verse" is playing right before his eyes!?

description.en:
One day, I transmigrated to an unknown story!
 
My parents here have passed away, and it was only after being adopted by a new duke that I realized what story I transmigrated to…
 
A tragic BL webtoon where all the characters die- and at the center of it, I’m the first side character to die!
 
And on top of that, I’m destined to die by my favorite character, Lucian’s, hands?!
 
Fortunately, or unfortunately, we’re here before the start of the tragedy.
Since I’ve been adopted by the dukedom where my favorite character is, there’s still plenty of time to change the ending!
 
However…
 
I just wanted to change Lucian into a sweet guy and have a happily ever after, but why is his obsession coming towards my direction?!

description.en:
Noh Ga Jang has led the life of a warrior ever since he remembers, isolated from the world and illiterate to top it all, until he meets a beautiful woman who steals his heart. He marries her and they live a life of bliss, and she gets pregnant with his children. Against all odds, she unexpectedly dies during childbirth, leaving Noh alone with their newborn triplets. Desperate, saddened, but not broken, Noh swears to the heavens that he'll become an exemplary man to raise the invaluable treasures his wife left him.  
  
Watch the mighty warrior Noh become a Peerless Dad, and slowly realize in the way just how powerful he is for the sake of his children.

하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

description.ru:
История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

description.ar:
"الآن ، أنت الوحيد المتبقي ، سيدتي." لقد تجسدت من جديد كابنة لبارون في رواية قرأتها في حياتي السابقة. بفضل ذلك علمت أن الصبي الذي أحضره والدي ليكون عبدًا سيقتل الباروني ، وسأواجه موتًا مروّعًا ، ونهاية هذا العالم. لقد عملت بجد من أجل تجنب هذا المصير البائس ، لكن كل شيء كان هباءً. في النهاية ، على يد الشخص الذي استيقظ كالساحر الكبير مات أبي وجميع الخدم. والآن سأموت أيضًا ... هل هذا ما اعتقدته؟ "أردت أن أبقيك يا سيدتي." بدأ شرير هذا العالم يصبح مهووسًا بي. ... ولكن لم يكن هناك أي شيء مثل هذا في الأصل؟ أصبحت فاليتا التي بدأت في الابتعاد عن العمل الأصلي أقرب إلى الحقيقة المظلمة لهذا العالم. من العائلة الإمبراطورية المتورطة في الشؤون القذرة وظهور وحوش مجهولة. لقد أرادت فقط أن تعيش بحرية ولكن في وضع تحتاج فيه إلى إنقاذ العالم أولاً! هل ستتمكن فاليتا من العثور على الحياة التي تريدها؟

description.en:
One day, my father gave me a boy slave. He said he saved him from the battlefield due to his good looks.

"He has a seal engraved on his heart. As long as you have this bead, he won't be able to disobey you. So you can order him to do anything."

The boy looked rather grim after hearing what he was I ordered. Ah, was I treating him too much like a dog? As my father squeezed the bead, the boy then knelt at my feet.

"Master," his red eyes flashed, illuminating his eerie gaze while smiling madly.

Why is he like this to me?! I tried my best to treat him properly!

---
Reborn as the daughter of a count she read about in a novel, Lady Valeta knows the story ends in tragedy at the hands of her lowly house pet, Reinhart. Having never wanted him in the first place, Valeta tries but fails to oust him from her house. But when Reinhart's powerful magic is awakened one day, he kills all those around her, and it is now Valeta who is at his mercy. Though the tables have turned, Reinhart can't shake his attachment for Valeta. He lets her live, but only within his grasp.

description.fr:
Un jour, mon père m’a donné un garçon esclave. Il a dit qu’il l’avait sauvé du champ de bataille grâce à sa bonne mine. « Il a un sceau gravé sur son coeur. Tant que tu as cette perle, il ne pourra pas te désobéir. Donc vous pouvez lui ordonner de faire n’importe quoi. » Le garçon avait l’air plutôt sinistre après avoir entendu ce que je lui ordonnais. Ah, est-ce que je le traitais trop comme un chien ? Alors que mon père pressait la perle, le garçon s’est agenouillé à mes pieds. « Maître » Ses yeux rouges ont clignoté, illuminant son regard sinistre tout en souriant follement. Pourquoi est-il comme ça avec moi ? ! J’ai fait de mon mieux pour le traiter correctement !

description.id:
Terlahir sebagai putri dari Count dalam novel yang dibacanya, Valleta tahu cerita ini berakhir dengan insiden atas ulah budaknya, Reinhart. Valleta yang tidak pernah menginginkan dirinya sejak awal, berusaha keras mengusirnya tapi gagal. Suatu hari saat kekuatan sihir Reinhart bangkit, dia membunuh semua orang, dan sekarang Valleta yang berada dalam belas kasihannya. Meskipun situasi sudah berbalik, Reinhart tidak mampu membunuh Valleta. Dia membiarkan wanita itu hidup, tapi dalam pengawasannya.

description.ko:
"자, 이제 너만 남았네. 주인님."

전생에 읽었던 소설 속 백작 영애로 환생했다. 

덕분에 아버지가 내 노예라고 데려온 한 소년에 의해 백작 가문이 몰살당하는 것도,
내가 끔찍한 죽음을 맞이한다는 것도,
이 세계의 결말도 알 수 있었다. 

그 비참한 운명을 피하기 위해 노력했지만 모두 헛수고였다. 
결국 대마법사로 각성한 그의 손에 아버지와 시종들은 모두 죽었다. 
이제 나도 죽.....을줄 알았는데?

"난 주인님이 가지고 싶었거든."

이 세계의 흑막이 나에게 집착하기 시작한다. 

.....이런 건 원작에 없었는데?

원작에서 벗어난 발레타는 조금씩 이 세계의 어두운 진실에 가까워져간다.
더러운 수작질을 벌이고 있었던 황실부터, 정체를 알 수 없는 마물들의 등장까지.

자유롭게 살고 싶었을 뿐인데 세상부터 먼저 구해야하는 상황!
과연 발레타는 원하는 삶을 찾을 수 있을까?

description.uk:
Одного дня мій батько подарував мені прислугу. Він сказав, що врятував його, забравши з поля бою, через гарну зовнішність. «На його серці вирізьблена печатка. Поки ти матимеш цей кулон, він не зможе протистояти тобі. Отже, ти можеш наказати йому зробити все, що завгодно.». Почувши, що його воля в моїх руках, хлопець нахмурився.
«Ох, я занадто перебільшую, поводячись із тобою — наче із собакою?», — у цей момент батько стиснув у кулак цю намистину, і хлопець упав на коліна перед моїми ногами.
«Панно…, — його червоні очі блиснули, розкриваючи весь моторошний погляд, а губи розходилися в божевільній посмішці: — Чому він так ставиться до мене?! Я ж так намагався догодити йому!»

---

title.en: The Strongest God of War in the City

description.en: Ning Bei suffered a family rebellion when he was young, and fled to the northern border alone. For thirteen years, he honed himself as the invincible god of war in the northern border, and protected his home country with a northern king sword. One day, Ning Bei returned to dragon city and faced the battle again. Once love and hatred, his road to revenge began.
description.zh: 宁北幼年遭逢家变，孤身逃亡北境，一十三载岁月，磨砺出战无不胜的北境战神，一把北王刀护家国安泰，终有一天，宁北返归龙城，重新面对曾经的爱恨情仇，他的复仇之路就此展开。

On the order of the High Priest, the holy kingdom’s inquisitor, “McClat” captures the wicked great witch, ‘Vienny’. Vienny, on the other hand, promises him she would assist him in his quest for the other witches. Although Vienny appears to be terrified in his presence, she is unconcerned about the witches' cleansing. McClat's sentiments and ideas get increasingly muddled with her presence...

title.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keep Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keep Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. He sister hates him. His mother neglected him— Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?! Thus commence a youthful Romcom full of misunderstandings!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

description.en:
As a behaviour manipulator, Cheng Ran was good at finding human’s weaknesses and manipulating their behaviour. He thought he knew the human heart like the back of his hand: “The reward I want is... to kill you.” 

Cheng Ran knelt on the ground, his hand and chin perched on Han Qi's knee, looking into Han Qi's eyes like a puppy with his head tilted. “Start a fire, I'll hold onto your corpse, and get burned into ashes along with this house. Our ashes, the ashes of this world, muddled together, never to be separated again.” Cheng Ran is confident that what he said in this moment are love words that Han Qi wanted to hear the most. Han Qi has indeed frozen. “It’s impossible to burn humans into ashes by burning the house.” 

Han Qi gently caressed Cheng Ran's head with his hand, like soothing a little puppy. He pondered for a while and slowly said: “The body has to be burned in an incinerator at a high temperature of 1,000° for an hour. Afterwards, use a hammer to break the calcified bones. Finally, you had to grind it finely, for it to become ashes.” Cheng Ran was surprised at Han Qi's knowledge of the cremation process, and he’s even more surprised that his thoughts seem to be deviated from expectations. “Okay.” Han Qi looked at Cheng Ran's eyes intently. 

Okay? Cheng Ran was shocked. What's okay about it? That was dirty talk! I’m not asking you to execute it! Cheng Ran thought using his body would get the other party to open up, but unexpectedly the other party used his heart and accompanied him in this forbidden game. 

Fraudster Masochist Uke x Willingly Gets Baited Crazy Sadist with Tenacious Mask Seme

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.en: I Seduced the Northern Duke

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?
